messages.message: Hi Team, I have initiated sandbox creation 30mins ago, I still see sandbox is not created. Any insights to resolve the issue is much appreciated.

You've the same error as this thread (https://instabase.slack.com/archives/C05L87V014J/p1738666001332329). The sandbox should be accessible in this case where you can use the solution provided by @sean.donohoe

Hi @Prakhar thank you for the update, when I try to run the build command I am getting forbidden error
```d /home/owner/instabase/data-services/doc-services/conversion-service \
&& docker build --cache-to=type=registry,ref=549230430157.dkr.ecr.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/instabase-build/conversion-service:cache,mode=max,image-manifest=true,oci-mediatypes=true (http://549230430157.dkr.ecr.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/instabase-build/conversion-service:cache,mode=max,image-manifest=true,oci-mediatypes=true) --cache-from=type=registry,ref=549230430157.dkr.ecr.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/instabase-build/conversion-service:cache (http://549230430157.dkr.ecr.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/instabase-build/conversion-service:cache) --progress=plain \
--build-arg BASE_JAVA_IMAGE_TAG=master \
-t instabase/conversion-service .
#0 building with "default" instance using docker driver

#1 [internal] load build definition from Dockerfile
#1 transferring dockerfile: 1.61kB done
#1 DONE 0.0s

#2 [internal] load metadata for gcr.io/instabase-build/container-base-java-jre:master (http://gcr.io/instabase-build/container-base-java-jre:master)
#2 ERROR: failed to authorize: failed to fetch anonymous token: unexpected status from GET request to https://gcr.io/v2/token?scope=repository%3Ainstabase-build%2Fcontainer-base-java-jre%3Apull&scope=repository%3Ainstabase-build%2Fgcr.io%2Fcontainer-base-java-jre%3Apull&service=gcr.io: 403 Forbidden
------
 > [internal] load metadata for gcr.io/instabase-build/container-base-java-jre:master (http://gcr.io/instabase-build/container-base-java-jre:master):
------
Dockerfile:8
--------------------
   6 |     
   7 |     # Set the base image to container-base
   8 | >>> FROM gcr.io/instabase-build/container-base-java-jre:$BASE_JAVA_IMAGE_TAG (http://gcr.io/instabase-build/container-base-java-jre:$BASE_JAVA_IMAGE_TAG)
   9 |     
  10 |     # File Author / Maintainer
--------------------
ERROR: failed to solve: gcr.io/instabase-build/container-base-java-jre:master (http://gcr.io/instabase-build/container-base-java-jre:master): failed to authorize: failed to fetch anonymous token: unexpected status from GET request to https://gcr.io/v2/token?scope=repository%3Ainstabase-build%2Fcontainer-base-java-jre%3Apull&scope=repository%3Ainstabase-build%2Fgcr.io%2Fcontainer-base-java-jre%3Apull&service=gcr.io: 403 Forbidden
make: *** [Makefile:33: build-docker] Error 1```
What build command are you running?
Have you tried for any other service?
I tried celery-app-tasks and model-service both build are successful. I am facing issue with conversion service only

Then, its a service specific issue ig.
@sean.donohoe @mfichman might be able to help!
